
  CREATE TABLE "LACLS"."PRODUCTOS2" 
   (	
    "IDPRODUCTO" NUMBER(10) GENERATED BY DEFAULT ON NULL AS IDENTITY MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9999999999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 CACHE 20 NOORDER  NOCYCLE  NOKEEP  NOSCALE  NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	"PRODUCTO" VARCHAR2(100 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	 CONSTRAINT "PRODUCTOS2_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("IDPRODUCTO")
   ) ;

  CREATE TABLE "LACLS"."FACTURAS" 
   (	
    "IDFACTURA" NUMBER(10) GENERATED BY DEFAULT ON NULL AS IDENTITY MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9999999999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 CACHE 20 NOORDER  NOCYCLE  NOKEEP  NOSCALE  NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	"NUMEROFACTURA" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	"FECHA" DATE, 
	"TIPOPAGO" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	"DOCUMENTOCLIENTE" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	"NOMBRECLIENTE" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	"SUBTOTAL" NUMBER(17, 2) NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	"DESCUENTO" NUMBER(5, 2), 
	"IVA" NUMBER(5, 2) NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	"TOTALDESCUENTO" NUMBER(17, 2), 
	"TOTALIMPUESTO" NUMBER(17, 2) NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	"TOTAL" NUMBER(17, 2) NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	 CONSTRAINT "FACTURAS_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("IDFACTURA")
   ) ;
   
  CREATE TABLE "LACLS"."LINEASFACTURAS" 
   (	
    "IDLINEA" NUMBER(10) GENERATED BY DEFAULT ON NULL AS IDENTITY MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9999999999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 CACHE 20 NOORDER  NOCYCLE  NOKEEP  NOSCALE  NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	"IDFACTURA" NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	"IDPRODUCTO" NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	"CANTIDAD" NUMBER(5, 2), 
	 CONSTRAINT "LINEASFACTURAS_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("IDLINEA"),
     CONSTRAINT "FACTURA_FK"
    FOREIGN KEY (IDFACTURA)
    REFERENCES FACTURAS(IDFACTURA)
   ) ;
